definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: Methods 37 cases of in-patients with schizophrenia were treated with Quetiatine for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 方法对37例精神分裂症住院病人用奎的平治疗8周。

sentences.english: Analysis gave her an outlet to discuss her problems with schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 分析给她一个讨论她精神分裂症的出路。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effects and safety of aripiprazole in the treatment of schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨阿立哌唑治疗精神分裂症的疗效及安全性。

sentences.english: Objectives: To investigate the relation between obstetric complications and schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨母亲孕产期并发症与子代精神分裂症的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the clinical characteristics between early onset and late onset schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解早发和晚发性精神分裂症的临床特征。

sentences.english: Objective To study of clinical features of family and sporadic schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨家族性与散发性精神分裂症的异同。

sentences.english: Objective To explore effects of performance planning therapy on schizophrenia in rehabilitative period.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨作业计划疗法对康复期精神分裂症的作用。

sentences.english: After identification, Xu suffering from sudden sharp schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 经鉴定，徐某患有突发性急剧性精神分裂症。

sentences.english: Conclusions Occupational and recreation treatment had obvious curative effect for the rehabilitation of schizophrenia patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论工娱治疗对精神分裂症病人的康复有明显疗效。

sentences.english: There is variation in the many process of information processing with schi_zophrenic.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症患者多个信息加工过程存在异常。

sentences.english: Objective To explore inducing factors of first-episode schizophrenics and its coping maneuvers.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨首发精神分裂症的诱因及其应对策略。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into the influence of nursing intervention on medicine- taking compliance of schizophrenia patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨护理干预对精神分裂症病人服药依从性的影响。

sentences.english: Objective A controlled study of clinical features of familial and sporadic schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨家族性与散发性精神分裂症临床特征的异同。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the efficacy and safety of Quetiapine in treating female schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证奎硫平对女性精神分裂症的疗效及安全性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mengshi Ditan Decoction has therapeutic effect for schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 结论中药礞石涤痰汤对精神分裂症有治疗作用。

sentences.english: One patient suffered from schizophrenia 1 week after operation.
sentences.chinese: 有1例于术后1周曾出现精神分裂症状。
